department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) has a requirement for the professional services of three (3) experienced resources, one (1) Business Analyst (intermediate), one (1) Change Management Consultant (senior) and one (1) Project Scheduler (senior) capable of performing all services and related duties in support of the TCS Digital Evolution Initiative for two (2) years with an additional two (2) one-year option periods."",
full_summary:
**Title** 
TBIPS Trade Commissioner Service Digital Evolution Project

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

**Reference Number** 
23-226656

**Organization**
Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)

**Notice Date** 
2022-11-22

**Submission Deadline** 
2022-12-14 02:00 PM EST

**Description**
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is inviting Suppliers to submit a Proposal for the provision of Task-Based Information Professional Services (TBIPS) to support the TCS Digital Evolution Initiative. The scope of work includes requring the services of three experienced resources, one Business Analyst (intermediate), one Change Management Consultant (senior) and one Project Scheduler (senior).

**Solicitation Method**
Competitive Selective Tendering

**Trade Agreements**
The procurement is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

**Suppliers Invited**

A list of 15 suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal for this requirement, including:

* ADIRONDACK INFORMATION MANAGEMENT INC.
* CISTEL TECHNOLOGY INC.
* Flex Tech Services Inc.
* IN JOINT VENTURE

**Security Requirements**
The contract will be subject to Common PS SRCL #19 and will require the resources to have Secret level security clearance.

**Submittal Requirements**

A complete RFP package will be sent directly to the invited suppliers via email. Suppliers should submit their proposal to Kingsley Knight, Contracting Authority at [Kingsley.Knight@international.gc.ca](mailto:Kingsley.Knight@international.gc.ca).

**Contact Information**

Kingsley Knight, Contracting Authority
Phone: 343-203-8234
Email: [Kingsley.Knight@international.gc.ca](mailto:Kingsley.Knight@international.gc.ca)

Please note that the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles.

This document has been rephrased to have a more professional tone, making it easier to read. The original text has been condensed to fit within the 400-word limit. The highlights of the tender are as follows:

* The Directorate of SPTS methodology and life cycle will be put into use.
* Up to three (3) resources will be needed to support the TCS Digital Evolution Initiative.
* The contract will last for two (2) years, with an option to extend by two
